PKParameter.name: C_max
PKParameter.description: Maximum concentration

PKParameter.name: C_max_norm
PKParameter.description: Maximum concentration normalized to dose, with dose in drug mass per body weight

PKParameter.name: C_max_tD1_tD2
PKParameter.description: Maximum concentration of the first application interval

PKParameter.name: C_max_tD1_tD2_norm
PKParameter.description: Maximum concentration of the first application interval normalized to dose, with dose in drug mass per body weight

PKParameter.name: C_max_tDLast_tEnd
PKParameter.description: Maximum concentration following the last application

PKParameter.name: C_max_tDLast_tEnd_norm
PKParameter.description: Maximum concentration following the last application normalized to dose, with dose in drug mass per body weight

PKParameter.name: t_max
PKParameter.description: Time at which the maximum concentration occurs

PKParameter.name: t_max_tD1_tD2
PKParameter.description: Time at which the maximum concentration occurs within the first application interval

PKParameter.name: t_max_tDLast_tEnd
PKParameter.description: Time at which the maximum concentration occurs following the last application

PKParameter.name: C_tEnd
PKParameter.description: Concentration at the end of simulation

PKParameter.name: C_trough_tD2
PKParameter.description: Trough concentration just before the second dose is administered

PKParameter.name: C_trough_tDLast
PKParameter.description: Trough concentration just before the last dose is administered

PKParameter.name: AUC_tEnd
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve from the first to the last data point

PKParameter.name: AUC_tEnd_norm
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve from the first to the last data point normalized to dose, with dose in drug mass per body weight

PKParameter.name: AUC_inf
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve from the first data point extrapolated to infinity

PKParameter.name: AUC_inf_norm
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve from the first data point extrapolated to infinity normalized to dose, with dose in drug mass per body weight

PKParameter.name: AUC_tD1_tD2
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve from the administration time of the first dose until the administration time of the second dose

PKParameter.name: AUC_tD1_tD2_norm
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve of the first application interval normalized to dose, with dose in drug mass per body weight

PKParameter.name: AUC_tDLast_minus_1_tDLast
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve from the administration time of the last dose but one until administration time of the last dose

PKParameter.name: AUC_tDLast_minus_1_tDLast_norm
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve from the administration time of the last dose but one until administration time of the last dose normalized to dose, with dose in drug mass per body weight

PKParameter.name: AUC_inf_tD1
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve from the first data point extrapolated to infinity (further administrations not considered!)

PKParameter.name: AUC_inf_tD1_norm
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve from the first data point extrapolated to infinity (further administrations not considered!) normalized to dose, with dose in drug mass per body weight

PKParameter.name: AUC_inf_tDLast
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve from the time of the last dose extrapolated to infinity

PKParameter.name: AUC_inf_tDLast_norm
PKParameter.description: Area under the concentration vs. time curve from the time of the last dose extrapolated to infinity normalized to dose, with dose in drug mass per body weight

PKParameter.name: MRT
PKParameter.description: Mean residence time of a drug molecule within the organism (Note MRT_iv=MRT-infusiontime*0.5)

PKParameter.name: Thalf
PKParameter.description: Half life time associated with terminal slope

PKParameter.name: Thalf_tDLast_tEnd
PKParameter.description: Half life time determined following the administration of the last dose until end of simulation

PKParameter.name: FractionAucLastToInf
PKParameter.description: Fraction of AUC from the last data point to infinity

PKParameter.name: CL
PKParameter.description: D/AUC - Total body clearance of drug or apparent clearance (CL for intravenous administration)

PKParameter.name: Vss
PKParameter.description: CL*MRT - Apparent volume of distribution at steady-state (Vss for intravenous administration)

PKParameter.name: Vd
PKParameter.description: D/AUC/lambda- Apparent volume of distribution during terminal phase (Vd for intravenous administration)
